recipe.title: Bibb Lettuce, Parsley, and Mint Salad
ingredients: 1 medium head Bibb lettuce, leaves torn if large (6 cups)
1/2 seedless cucumber, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk together lemon juice, oils, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Toss lettuce, herbs, and cucumber with just enough dressing to coat.
